availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thompson B. Eastes (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Louisa Marshall Eastes in Green County, Kentucky, on September 24, 1843. Father of John Eastes, Malancthon Eastes, and Nancy Eastes. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1850. Household owned Jordin [Unknown] in Green County in 1857. Farmer in Green County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Green County in 1860.
